definition: Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei
Wanquan county in Zhangjiakou 張家口|张家口[Zhang1 jia1 kou3], Hebei

sentences.english: Before climbing it is BEST to be properly prepared, in case of any mishap.
sentences.chinese: 爬山之前最好有万全的准备，以免发生山难。

sentences.english: because she had prepared for the interview thoroughly.
sentences.chinese: 因为她已经为这次面试做好了万全的准备。

sentences.english: No system can be fully foolproof.
sentences.chinese: 没有哪个系统是万全的。

sentences.english: We hold a sure card to be practical.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为万全之策是切实可行的。

sentences.english: One surefire way to attract new customers and readers is to go outside of your existing niche boundaries.
sentences.chinese: 一个吸引新读者和顾客的万全之策就是跳出你的圈子。

sentences.english: We hold a sure card to be practicable.
sentences.chinese: 我们认为万全之策是切实可行的。

sentences.english: Lowering retail prices is no panacea.
sentences.chinese: 降低零售价并非万全之计。

sentences.english: There are no absolute guarantees about what to do when it comes to choosing fruit.
sentences.chinese: 在挑选水果的时候，没有什么万全之策。

sentences.english: Want a sure-fire way to improve your marriage?
sentences.chinese: 想要个提高婚姻质量的万全之策？

sentences.english: Industrial Computing rarely has a "one size fits all" solution.
sentences.chinese: 工业电脑很少有“万全之策”的解决办法。

sentences.english: Flees completely safe causes Ding Luoshan to suspend the inspection, Liu Yong becomes acts bureau chief.
sentences.chinese: 万全出逃导致丁洛山被停职检查，刘勇成为代理局长。

definition: lit. before it rains, bind around with silk (idiom, from Book of Songs 詩經|诗经); fig. to plan ahead/to prepare for a rainy day
to guard against the unexpected (idiom); just in case/prepared for any eventualities
to prepare/get ready/to provide or equip
to work out a strategy/to come up with a plan for
to face the enemy/to meet an attack
a way out/a way to retreat/leeway
Preparedness averts peril./to be prepared, just in case (idiom)
to meet a contingency/to adapt oneself to changes
to plan in advance (idiom)/a card up one's sleeve/forewarned is forearmed
